content: details full youtube tutorial 1 introducing our enchanting eyelet bandana pattern where rustic charm meets contemporary elegance in a delightful ode to the cottage core aesthetic inspired by the idyllic tranquility of country living this pattern features a mesmerizing slanted line of eyelets reminiscent of sun-dappled meadows and gentle breezes perfect for embracing the cozy allure of cottage core style this accessory adds a touch of whimsy and romance to any outfit whether you are knitting for yourself or a loved one our pattern promises a delightful journey filled with nostalgia and creativity transport yourself to a world of rustic beauty and timeless grace with every stitch materials any summery yarn could be used to knit this pattern if you want to use the finished product as a bandana/hairkerchief it is also a great stash buster for your single summer yarns 50gr needle size could be adjusted according to your yarn choice i used 3 25mm/us3 for all my three samples as the main needle and 2 5mm us1 5 dpns for the i-cord 1 https //youtu be/bqnclxf6slo
